name: Pangoro
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won’t put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.

abilities.name: Benevolent Boss
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, it gets +20 HP for each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crazy Knuckle
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 40 more damage.
